common.Heading: Heading
common.notAllowedItemInColumn: This item is not allowed in column
common.clickToAddItem: Click here to add a item

Column.confirmMakeColumnSmaller: Because a number less than the current number of columns was specified, the column will be delete.

List.reachedMaxRow: The number of rows has reached the maximum({n} rows) and can not be added anymore.

Table.rowRangeError: The number of rows in the table can be set in the range of {min}-{max}.
Table.colRangeError: The number of columns in the table can be set in the range of {min}-{max}.
Table.rowEmptyError: The number of rows in the table has not been set.
Table.colEmptyError: The number of columns in the table has not been set.
Table.decreaseConfirm: Data is lost because it is smaller than the current input area. Is it OK?
Table.reachedMaxRow: The number of rows has reached the maximum value and can not be added any more.
Table.reachedMaxCol: The number of columns has reached the maximum value and can not be added any more.
Table.reachedMinRow: The number of rows has reached the minimum value and can not be deleted any more.
Table.reachedMinCol: The number of columns has reached the minimum value and can not be deleted any more.
Table.cannotMoveRow: You can not move a row if the source or destination location contains merged cells.
Table.cannotMoveCol: You can not move a column if the source or destination location contains merged cells.
Table.headerizeRow: Turn a row into a table header
Table.deheaderizeRow: Return a row into a table data
Table.clearRow: Clear the contents of a row
Table.addColLeft: Add a column to the left
Table.addColRight: Add a column to the right
Table.headerizeCol: Turn a column into a table header
Table.deheaderizeCol: Return a column into a table data
Table.clearCol: Clear the contents of a column
Table.headerizeCell: Trun cells into a table header
Table.deheaderizeCell: Return cells into a table data

ImageEdit.cancelInputAlert: Discards the input contents.Is it OK?
